JACQ's Restorative Face Serum

Brand: Jacq's

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Vegetable Glycerin, Leucidal Bioferment (Radish Root) Extract, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Xatham Gum, Cucurbita Pepo (Pumpkin) Seed Oil, Arctium Lappa (Burdock) Root Extract, Carica Papaya (Papaya) Fruit Extract, Ananas Sativus

ract, Ananas Sativus (Pineapple) Fruit Extract, Panthenol, Citrus Medica Limonium (Lemon) Peel Extract, Citric Acid, Rosa Sinensis linn (Hibiscus) Petal Extract, Squalane, Tocopherol (Non-GMO), Pure Essential Oils and Leucidal Liquid (Radish Root Ferment)

Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Dev
